title: Papyrus Inscribed in Greek
description:
Fragment of papyrus inscribed on recto only in Greek. Twenty-three lines preserved; below the papyrus is broken and crushed together but apparently most of lower portion is preserved. Right edges retain portions of another sheet of same document. 
A divorce agreement made between a woman named Aphrodisia daughter of Sabinus and Ammo and Ptolemais son of Ptolemais and Soeris in Ptolemais Euergetes, consisting of thirty lines of partial text.  This contract was part of a τόμος συγκολλήσιμος.	
Condition: Fair.  Only a very few separated fragments.
credit_line: Bequest of Theodora Wilbour from the collection of her father, Charles Edwin Wilbour

museum_location.name: This item is not on view
